                                         int nOld,
                                         int nNew,
                                         double valNew)
        Extend a double array to be at least as big as requested size.
        Parameters:
        array - The array to be resized
        nOld - The size of the old array (not necessarily array.length)
        nNew - The desired new size
        valNew - Value to initialise new elements with
        Returns:
        The new array
